name: Chicken Scream - Go Sing & Scream
description:
Chicken scream is a fun and interactive addictive game where use your voice to move your chicken and make it jump.

Make a lot of noise, sing and shout to force the chicken to run and jump or stay quiet to control the chicken moves slowly.

Get your high score and collect points for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles and the water!

**** How to play and control the chicken ? ****
- Adjust the sensitivity slider
- Don't make any noise to make the chicken stop
- Speak softly to make the chicken walk
- Scream to make the chicken jump
